name: Unity Chan Adventures
description:
The Bug King and his goons have taken over Unity World and its up to Unity Chan to set things right!

Squash some bugs, collect some coins and find the hidden level teleporters in your...

Unity Chan Adventures!

  • Run, Jump, and Double Jump your way through multiple  fantastic colorful levels!
  • Cutting edge Unity Chan "Unite in the Sky" & SmartSound soundtracks to groove to in each level!
  • Stay away from the Water! Unity Chan can't swim and doesn't like to get her hair wet!
  • Family Friendly 3D Platforming Game that can be enjoyed by all!
  • Xbox 360 Controller Compatible!

Controls - Keyboard:

WSAD / Arrow Keys = Move around

ESC key = Pause / Unpause

Backspace Key = Quit Game (Executable Games)

Mouse Look = Move Camera

Right Mouse Button = Snap Camera Behind Player

Spacebar = Jump (x2 = Double Jump)

Controls - Xbox 360  Controller:

Left Joystick = Move around

Start Button = Pause / Unpause

B Button = Snap Camera Behind Player

Y Button = Jump (x2 = Double Jump)
